summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of West 100th Street from 1st Avenue Northwest to 3rd Avenue Northwest; and certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 17255 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
